text.p: Secondhand tonnage brokers reported the sale of the following vessels.
TWEENDECKERS - Fay - (built 1979) 20,376 dwt sold for $4.2 million to undisclosed buyers.
Gallia - 8,914 dwt sold to Japanese buyers for $21 million.
Kathe Sif - (built 1981) sold To Norwegian buyers for $9.5 million.
CONTAINERS - California Triton - (built 1983) 30,941 dwt sold to Greek buyers for $13 million.
SOLD FOR DEMOLITION - Zea - 108,566 dwt sold to Dubai-based cash buyers for $140 per ldt for delivery "as is" to Singapore.
Some of these sales may not be final as they may be subject to survey, inspection or other conditions.
